item.title: Lifting for Rec Rowers
item.description: layout: single title: “Lifting for Rec Rowers” url: /rowing-lifting date: 2019-09-14 menu: sidebar: name: ‘Lifting for Rec’ identifier: lifting parent: rowing Lifting weights is the best way to build strength, which translates to peak power in rowing. This is a guide intended for the adult rec/masters rower looking to improve that strength (both over the offseason and as supplemental training during the rowing season.) Philosophy Thoughts “Better athletes are better rowers.
